data.name: Love, Chunibyo & Other Delusions! : Japanese Audio with English Subtitles: Holy Mother's... Pandora's Box
data.short_description: Rikka and Yuta are unsure of where they're headed, and each gets some advice from a friend.  Rikka's sister reveals her intention of studying the culinary arts in France.
